title: Visual and Sound Effect Updates: Anivia, Dr. Mundo, Renekton, Gragas & Teemo
body:
Hello everyone!

Similar to the [recent Jarvan, Lee Sin, Veigar, and Vi updates](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/J8p5dlpl-visual-effect-and-sound-effect-updates-to-jarvan-lee-sin-veigar-and-vi), we're working on VFX and SFX updates to more champions whose spell effects are in need of some love to get to current League standards and improve gameplay clarity. In Patch 8.24, we'll be releasing VFX and SFX updates for Anivia, Dr. Mundo and Renekton, and VFX-only updates for Gragas _(he already received some SFX love)_ and Teemo. Keep an eye on this post and we'll add visual previews as they become ready! Please try them out on the PBE—especially if you're a main—when they're in and leave us your feedback here!

Starting off with our first preview...

# {{champion:36}} Dr. Mundo

https://imgur.com/a/hYsuomu

##VFX
###_VFX update across the board to clean up unnecessary noise and improve gameplay clarity._
**BA** - New trails and impacts for more satisfaction.
**Q** - Now clearer, with a subtle trail to make it more easily readable. Cleaver also now stays stuck in the target for a short time, for maximum satisfaction!
**W** - Now properly shows the range of the AOE, while feeling more threatening. Targets are also briefly _visually_ put on fire when damaged.
**E** - New buff effect on his wrists makes it easier to identify when it's active.
**R** - Bigger initial burst and overall clearer effect makes it actually look like a heal, and is now much easier to see in a Teamfight. Or a tower-dive.

##SFX
###_SFX update across the board to clean up unnecessary noise and added higher definition sounds._
**BA** - Clearer SFX on the hit of the attack.
**Q** - Clearer SFX on when the cleaver is thrown and hits.
**W** - Activation audio is clearer.
**E** - Added Zaun elements into the audio.
**R** - Added Zaun elements into the audio.

And here's the video for Mundo:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0KRoF1Z_tYM

And an update to his Q sounds:
https://youtu.be/cHnAFhKfObI

All Mundo skins that previously used base VFXs have been updated to use the new ones, with subtle changes where it makes sense.

# {{champion:79}} Gragas

Read more here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/pjKXqRsl-visual-and-sound-effect-updates-gragas


# {{champion:17}} Teemo

Read more here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/UfFT2huQ-visual-effects-update-teemo

We'll be showing previews of the other champions in the near future, so keep your eyes peeled!

replies.body: Mundo changes look great, although the cleaver being so green and not having a huge meaty impact effect is a bit odd to me. I'm not sure *why* I associated it more with a red effect (probably Mundo's W and E), but I guess I'll grow accustomed to it!

Heyo! Thank you! So, his big meaty bloody gory impact was... well, a bit too much of all of that. We tried to stay away from blood, and as the skill is actually an "infected" cleaver, we went a bit more into a green-ish/poisonous feel. This also links him a bit better to his Zaun origins. :)
Hope that makes sense!

Definitely think the current sound is better. The preview Cleaver-hit sound is much too higher pitched. The trademark "_thump_" is not something you should get rid of at all. It's like the most satisfying aspect of Mundo.

Hey, sound designer here! I did another pass where that thunk is more emphasized (it actually still has elements that exist in the new sound effect but with some other stuff done to it).

Let me know if this is feeling better for you! I also have Live Mundo's SFX in there for comparison.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHnAFhKfObI&feature=youtu.be

Hey, so I’m a Mundo main, and I think this is definitely going in be right direction!

I hunk the issue here is that the projectile sound is much more noisy than it used to be, which is de-emphasizing the actual impact. Can we either lower the volume of the in flight cleaver or raise the volume of the impact? Because the sound itself is fine, but it’s less satisfying, imo, because it’s not as stark of a contrast to a miss and a hit.
Ah gotcha! Yeah, that makes sense! I can pull down that volume a bit.

I agree with this. As a Mundo player, hearing that Q sound is satisfying as all hell. I wouldn't keep it the same, but maybe finding a way to combine the old THUNK with the new infected aesthetic is the way to go on this one.

Hey there, thanks for the comments! I replied to the person above you but I made an adjustment per the feedback with a comparison to Live. Let me know if it's still feeling off! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHnAFhKfObI&

So, his big meaty bloody gory impact was... well, a bit too much of all of that. We tried to stay away from blood, and as the skill is actually an "infected" cleaver, we went a bit more into a green-ish/poisonous feel. This also links him a bit better to his Zaun origins. :)
> Hope that makes sense!

Totally! I had a feeling that was the case -- it was just definitely unexpected! :)
Oooh im exited for the Anvia one!
Same!!
The guy is a VFX artist man not the entire dev team
Can't wait to see teemo's{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Can't wait to show you. :^)
I always had problem understanding when Teemo blinds me because his blind is pretty much the same as his auto attacks. Blind is very clear
That's definitely something we're tackling!
Any plans on making Trynd's ult less subtle since rn its super hard to tell when he's in ult other than just guessing

> Any plans on making Trynd's ult less subtle since rn its super hard to tell when he's in ult other than just guessing

Well if you can’t tell from the yelling/screaming or the red particle fx around him. Pretty sure the text “undying rage” appears whenever you’re attacking him. That or his fury bar skyrockets whenever he ults

As a Renekton main I am very interested and looking forward to his particle effects!
So I got a question:
Are you updating his ult particles across all skins? Can we expect something for Galactic Renekton?
Any plans on giving back the nuts and bolts details on Renektoy's ult? 
https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/1200/_37ef18c3cb62ae55c4350aedf45aab87-png.jpg

Hey, Renekton's VFX artist here.
Renekton's VFX will be updated across all of his skins, as all of them had very old, unclear VFX.
Galactic Renekton will use base's VFX, but with a recolored Ult.
SKT Renekton also has recoloured base VFX, with a unique Ult decal featuring SKT's logo.
Pool Party Renekton's ult will be changed the least, it's just slightly adjusted to shift the focus to the edge of the AoE so you can clearly tell when an enemy is in range.
Renektoy is a weird case: As a 750 RP skin, it shouldn't have any unique VFX, but when he was made he was given Pool Party Renekton's ult, but with nuts and bolts (?). I inquired with the team who originally worked on him, and they said he was given Pool Party's ult because Base ult was so noisy, but the nuts and bolts were removed after it went to PBE, because the team felt they didn't really make sense as he's a toy and not a robot.
Because I've now fixed the noisiness of base, I'm reverting him to using base VFX.
Once I post my preview, please let me know how it feels. If it's feels bad, I will take a look and see what we can do for Renektoy's Ult. We're trying to respect skin pricing tiers, but since this is already a weird case, I might be able to do something unique for this skin.

The updated cleaver looks so much clearer. .-. I used to have a hard time seeing it and dodging it. Now I just wish you guys would stop giving champs yellow skillshots(*coughcoughlunarrevellux?!cough!*)
Gimme some badass and savage for Renekton!!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Wait you want something savage
I was hoping they'd replace every particle of Renekton's kit with cupcakes and rainbows
How did you guess what my plan was :O
New cleaver vfx got more polygons than mundo himself
Its so cool to see that you ended up working with riot after making videos on youtube. You're an inspiration to all people!
Is there annie chance that annie's gonna have her VFX rework? Sweetheart Annie and Frankentibbers Annie need some love...

Can i ask to rework his pizza feet  and maybe his muscles to look like something in similar size and more smooth like El Macho Mundo. These changes are great but still the game model look too OLD imo.
Those changes are only for his VFX and SFX, which allows us to make them much faster than a complete VGU or even a model update.
Any chance you'll do a pass like this on Udyr or LeBlanc?

Hi Riot Sirhaian  ( btw i like your work ) Here is in my opinion some champions that need some love too

{{champion:33}}  his R OK !
{{champion:23}} when he crit and R SFX isn't great 
{{champion:106}} is he a bear of a wolf ?
{{champion:111}}  when he R in TF it's not clear
{{champion:38}}  i think Everything on his kit needs an update SFX AND VFX
{{champion:82}}  {{champion:26}}  too old
JUST GIVE ME ANIVIAS ALREADY AAAAAAAA❤️❤️❤️❤️{{champion:34}}

I only use the little devil Teemo skin, is that one going to get updated?

Also a bit off topic, do you think Shaco will get this treatment or are you waiting to give him a proper VGU?
Quite unlikely that they will update modern skins with modern VFX like Little Devil or Omega Squad Teemo. This should only affect the outdated ones.
Exactly~! We're aiming at updating old and outdated visual and sound effects that are actively bad for gameplay. Little Devil and Omega Squad Teemo are totally fine from that perspective. :)
omega squad auto attack feels weird btw

As a loving main of The Madman of Zaun, I appreciate that he's getting some love! For one thing, I  love the overall changes made. His kit definitely lacked audio quality (especially for standards now), but I have a few points of criticism.

Q - Infected Cleaver
I like the new model, animation, and sound, but I think the coloring is a little too green to match his personality, character, lore, etc. His current Q is a decent mix between red and brown, and while I appreciate giving the Q some green to match the name and overall idea of the ability, I feel like it's a little overbearing. How am I supposed to play as a lollipop loving murderer without the murder?

W - Burning Agony
This and Masochism (well get to that later) were easily the most deserving of SFX and VFX overhauls, and for the most part, I feel this one doesn't have too much wrong with it. I love the cinders, detailed flame, and other fine parts of the animation, but I feel the sound is a little misleading. The activation is perfect; the player and enemy should have a clear, roaring indication of {{champion:36}} Mundo's "burning agony" coming about. However, the persistent sound is where my complaint lies. Because the ability is a simple AP per second, I don't think it should reminisce of burn champions like {{champion:90}} Malzahar or {{champion:63}} Brand by being so loud or... is demanding a word that works here?

E - Masochism
I..... I don't even know what to say. I'm not sure what yellow visuals have to do with {{champion:36}} Mundo's kit. I think it'd look nice if it was a {{item:3742}} Deadman's Plate type of animation/color.

R - Sadism
Honestly I've got no ill will towards this one. Great job!! :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

That's all for now. I would like to hear what you @Rioters think. Later!

Yup! I've actually been working on that yesterday. :)
